title: Two Sum
description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

title: Reverse Integer
description: Given a signed 32-bit integer x, return x with its digits reversed. If reversing x causes the value to go outside the signed 32-bit integer range [-2^31, 2^31 - 1], then return 0.

title: Container With Most Water
description: You are given an integer array height of length n. There are n vertical lines drawn such that the two endpoints of the ith line are (i, 0) and (i, height[i]). Find two lines that together with the x-axis form a container, such that the container contains the most water.

examples.explanation: The above vertical lines are represented by array [1,8,6,2,5,4,8,3,7]. In this case, the max area of water (blue section) the container can contain is 49.

title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
description: Given two sorted arrays nums1 and nums2 of size m and n respectively, return the median of the two sorted arrays.

title: Longest Palindromic Substring
description: Given a string s, return the longest palindromic substring in s.
constraints: s consist of only digits and English letters.
